an5.199:4.1: “When ethical renunciants come to a family, the people make much merit for five reasons.
an5.199:4.3: When they see ethical renunciants coming to their family, the people bring up confidence in their hearts. At that time the family is practicing a path leading to heaven.
an5.199:5.1: When ethical renunciants come to their family, the people rise from their seats, bow down, and offer them a seat. At that time the family is practicing a path leading to a birth in an eminent family.
an5.199:6.1: When ethical renunciants come to their family, the people get rid of the stain of stinginess. At that time the family is practicing a path leading to eminence.
an5.199:7.1: When ethical renunciants come to their family, the people share what they have as best they can. At that time the family is practicing a path leading to great wealth.
an5.199:8.1: When ethical renunciants come to their family, the people ask questions and listen to the teachings. At that time the family is practicing a path leading to great wisdom.
an5.199:8.2: When ethical renunciants come to a family, the people make much merit for these five reasons.”
